text: He muminasakala! Tomaloke atimatraa sandeha karaara paraa birata thaka. Niscaya kichumana sandeha papa; lagate tomaloke ijane sijanara gopaniya bisaya sandhana nakaraiba arau ejane anajanara gibata nakaraiba. Tomalokara majara konoba'i tara mrta bhatrra mansa khoraoto pachanda karaibane? Niscaya tomaloke seya apachanda karaa. Seye tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa; niscaya allaha ta'oba kabulakarai, parama dayalu
